transcript:
Customer: Kitna time ho gaya isko liye?

Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji sir very good afternoon. Rajiv ji baat kar rahe hain Daau ji Agro Enterprises mein?
Customer: Ji mam ji.
Executive: Sir Vidhi baat kar rahi thi.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haan ji actually aapka ek concern aaya tha like aap bol rahe the ki leads vagera nahi aa rahi thi Shubham ne mujhe bataya.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Haan ji haan ji.
Executive: So abhi sir vaise to humne update kara diya hai. So is bar to aapko ye problems nahi aayegi. Matlab jaise aap bol rahe the na ki lead achi nahi aa rahi hai pehle achi aati thi.
Customer: Ab mam kuch na kuch mam issue hai mere ko na jaise reset kar dete hain lead nahi aa rahi aur wo usko kuch na kuch jaise bolte hain na phone ko restart kar dete hain update kar dete hain kuch na kuch aise kijiye wo lead nahi aa rahi. Calling ek single bhi calling nahi aa rahi.
Executive: Humne sir reset hi karaya hai. Calling nahi hai.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haan even reset karane ke baad maine personally khud ye case aapka dekha hai is bar kyuki do se teen bar pehle bhi aap concern raise kar chuke the hamare end se right. To maine personally is bar ye update karaya hai.
Customer: Ab ye thodi mam ek call nahi aayi chalo char call ki bola tha mere ko per day. Chalo ek din nahi aayi do din nahi aayi teen din nahi aayi sapte nahi aayi aur do-do mahine bhi ek calling nahi aayi to mam kaise call kam chalega kuch na kuch to kami hai.
Executive: Sir aap ek cheez notice karoge maine dekhiye parso hi hamara update hua hai matlab parso bhi nahi even kal jab office open hua na Monday ko. Hmm.
Executive: To kal hi humne update karaya hai agar aap notice karoge to ab aapke paas kal ek call aayi bhi hai sham ko shayad aapki baat bhi hui hogi usse.
Customer: Haan haan to wohi keh raha hu to kuch na kuch issue tha na mere usme.
Executive: Aisa koi issue nahi tha sir but sometime ho jata hai jaise aapne bola na ki ek bar restart kara do. Refresh kara do to humne refresh karaya hai apne end se taki aapke paas leads bhi achi jaye sath hi sath calls bhi.
Customer: Nahi nahi aisa thodi hai kai bar aise bhi hota hai ab koi call aagyi inquiry aagyi theek hai. Jab maine complaint dali hai ab fir ye beech mein band ho jata hai aisa bhi hota hai mam.
Executive: Sir dekho ho sakta hai last month festivals the kafi sare back to back lage hue the me bhi is vajah se bhi thoda sa hamper ho sakta hai kyuki sirf aapke sath hi nahi. Sari companies ke sath hi same problem aa rahi thi kyuki hota kya hai na festivals time mein thoda sa clients busy hota hai matlab as a buyer bhi as a supplier bhi hum log bhi busy the right.
Executive: To me bhi is vajah se ho sakta hai last month thodi si problem aapne face ki ho inquiry calls se leads ko lekar.
Customer: Chalo mam please mam ye ek mera sort out kara dijiye bar bar nahi pareshan nahi ho raha.
Executive: For sure ye sort out ho gaya hai aapka. Theek hai maine apne end se request kara hai ab ye problem nahi aayegi aur in case kabhi aapko lagta hai na aisa. Mam lead aa jaye to.
Customer: Lead aa jaye.
Executive: Ki nahi aa rahi hai to aap na ek bar jo aapka website login karte ho na. Ek bar log out karke dobara login kiya kar liya karo aap. Sabse simple refresh karne ka sabse simple easy tarika hai.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Aap aap ek bar apna jo website hai na uska matlab laptop pe use karte ho ya phone pe. Usko ek bar aap log out karke dobara se login kar liya karo.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Aur turant hi page refresh ho jayega aapka.
Customer: Chalo mam login log out karne ke baad wo ID banwana kuch aur.
Executive: Sir pehle cheez to ab ye problem aayegi nahi maine apne end se khud solve karaya hai. Right.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai. To aap nishchint hoke use kijiye aap.
Customer: Theek hai. Ji mam ji.
Executive: Ji sir baki ye main close kara du?
Customer: Haan close kara do.
Executive: Theek hai sir okay. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer reported not receiving buyleads.

- Customer mentioned call volume decreased significantly.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed the issue was resolved.

- Executive suggested logging out and back into website.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, website, login, refresh, update
